title: Evenepoel, Vingegaard, Vine, Kras Sustain Fractures, Roglič Spared in High-Speed Crash
content:
UPDATED: Spill on rough roads at Itzulia Basque Country leaves trail of fractured bones, cuts, scrapes, and a punctured lung across several teams, but no life-threatening injuries.

Read the full article at Evenepoel, Vingegaard, Vine, Kras Sustain Fractures, Roglič Spared in High-Speed Crash on Velo.
author: ahood
